segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I notice the woman focused on polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress make her look like a typical busy mom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink behind her is a disaster, water gushing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing everywhere?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is getting bigger, and it's right under her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are up to no good, with the boy on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to grab cookies from the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just standing there, egging him on with her hand raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is infuriating; someone's going to slip or fall because of this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter, waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden outside, totally oblivious to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't stand how unaware everyone seems to be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she turns around now, there'll be a big scolding for those cookie thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR
